materials.raw_text: B: 120 g, Cr: 50 g, Fe: 150 g, Sc: 20 g, Tm: 20 g

sourcing.instructions: B: Supplier of boron compounds; Cr: Metal supply company; Fe: Local steel supplier; Sc: Rare metal supplier; Tm: Rare metal supplier.
steps: B: Supplier of boron compounds; Cr: Metal supply company; Fe: Local steel supplier; Sc: Rare metal supplier; Tm: Rare metal supplier.
1. Weigh each of the ingredients accurately using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each of the ingredients accurately using a digital scale.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed powder to a suitable crucible.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed powder to a suitable crucible.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 4-6 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 4-6 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the solidified material from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solidified material from the crucible.
